metadata.description: A Sword and Sorcery adventure of a formidable band of mercenaries on a quest for a legendary treasure. At the turbulent period of Christian and Barbarian clashes, a fearsome group of mercenaries reunite after many years apart to take on a secret mission for the Empress of Byzantium.  They must search for an infamous treasure hidden in the heart of the ancient underworld.  But for all the dangers that lie ahead, both human and supernatural, the greatest one may well rest within them.
metadata.name: The Hounds of Hell
